website_summaries.verdict: Simple wood paddles equipped with bright blue grips. Made for all ages, though paddle handles are also easy to hold for ages three and up.
pros: Paddle is made with light wood, and it’s easy to see the blue bull's eye
Set comes with three rubber balls, so there are spares on hand
Mesh storage bag for easy transport
cons: Not all packages include the correct ball, and some reports of the paddle splintering or breaking

customer_reviews.title: Paddles are good, but balls are solid rubber - too heavy/bouncy
customer_reviews.text: If you've had the classic paddle ball sets in the past, you are used to a ball that is hollow, somewhat light and with a moderate bounce. Though this set comes with 3 balls, they are constructed of heavy, solid rubber and have a significant bounce...which essentially means they are harder to control. (Not so good IMO.)
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Larner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beach. The handles didn't come off even when they got soaked in the ocean, and balls are perfect weight. Like the travel case too.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Gangi

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, came broken
customer_reviews.text: Bad material quality, cheap plastic and cheap wood. it came broken and uneven. Would not recommend even for the cheap price it is NOT worth it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Oshl

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! They are very big, but great quality. We live by the beach so we use these very often and they work well even when dropped in water! Handles are great.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney De Tello

customer_reviews.title: Like playing baseball with a sponge if you've had the ...
customer_reviews.text: Balls are not original hollow rubber but more foam and solid. Like playing baseball with a sponge if you've had the real thing. Sigh
customer_reviews.author: Sam Weller

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these. They didn’t even make it through a season and are splitting and breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. My kids had fun playing the game. Wood is good quality like the paddles in the 80's
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Kulas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite beach game and these seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality plastic handles
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality plastic handles. Wood and rubber balls are good quality
customer_reviews.author: Alin Stefanescu

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game for beach and kids
customer_reviews.text: Good quality-we used it on a beach and the water didn’t cause any issues on the material it is made of. The kids really enjoyed playing it!
customer_reviews.author: stella2626

customer_reviews.title: Great price for endless fun
customer_reviews.text: Great price for endless fun. Took the paddles camping at the beach and handled very well even when used by multiple players.
customer_reviews.author: Marbella Rojas

product_meta.title: Matty's Toy Stop Deluxe Wooden Paddle Ball Game Set with 3 Solid Rubber Balls & Mesh Storage Bag
product_meta.description: Matty's Toy Stop Deluxe Wooden Paddle Ball Game Set with 3 Solid Rubber Balls & Storage Bag, is AWESOME! Paddle Ball is an exciting action game for fun, skill and fitness. Needs no net, court or other accessories. Playable almost anywhere. Specially constructed racquets and ball for optimum control and ease of play. Ideal for beach, backyard, campus, playground, tennis club or campground. Set features 3 solid rubber balls (red, blue & green), along with a mesh storage bag. For Ages 3 and up - Fun for the whole family! - Makes a great gift!
feature_bullets: Matty's Toy Stop's Deluxe Paddle Ball Set features 2 high quality wooden paddles/rackets with bullseye design & plastic handles!
Set features 3 solid rubber balls (red, blue & green), along with a mesh storage bag.
Extra durable and made with the highest quality materials on the market!
Awesome for the beach, backyard, park, schools, vacation, exercise & so much more!
For Ages 3 and up - Fun for the whole family! - Makes a great gift!
